extension.title: Aspire VSCode
extension.description: Official Aspire extension for Visual Studio Code
extension.debug.defaultConfiguration.des: Launch the effective Aspire AppHost in your workspace.
aspire-vscode.strings.noCsprojFound: No AppHost found in the current workspace
aspire-vscode.strings.addressError: Failed to get RPC server address. The extension may not function correctly.
aspire-vscode.strings.noWorkspaceOpen: No workspace is open. Please open a folder or workspace before running this command.
aspire-vscode.strings.failedToShowPrompt: Failed to show prompt, text was empty.
aspire-vscode.strings.incompatibleAppHos: The app host is not compatible. Consider upgrading the app host or Aspire CLI.
aspire-vscode.strings.noCsharpBuildTask: No C# Dev Kit build task found.
aspire-vscode.strings.noWatchTask: No watch task found. Please ensure a watch task is defined in your workspace.
aspire-vscode.strings.unsupportedResourc: Attempted to start unsupported resource type: {0}
aspire-vscode.strings.errorRetrievingApp: Error retrieving app hosts in the current workspace. Debug options may be incomplete.
aspire-vscode.strings.launchingWithDirec: Launching Aspire debug session using directory {0}: attempting to determine effective AppHost...
aspire-vscode.strings.launchingWithAppHo: Launching Aspire debug session for AppHost {0}...
aspire-vscode.strings.disconnectingFromS: Disconnecting from Aspire debug session... Child processes will be stopped.
aspire-vscode.strings.csharpSupportNotEn: C# support is not enabled in this workspace. This project should have started through the Aspire CLI.
aspire-vscode.strings.dcpServerNotInitia: DCP server not initialized - cannot forward debug output
aspire-vscode.strings.aspireConfigExists: Aspire launch configuration already exists in launch.json
aspire-vscode.strings.aspireConfigAdded: Aspire launch configuration added to launch.json successfully!
aspire-vscode.strings.debugSessionAlread: A debug session is already active for id {0}.
